## Load Libraries

```{r load libraries}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(tigris)
options(tigris_class = "sf")

```

## Load the data

```{r}
homicide <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")
homicide <- homicide %>% 
  unite(city_name, city, state, sep = ", ", remove = TRUE) 
```

```{r}
il_counties <- counties(state = "IL", cb = TRUE, class = "sf")
class(il_counties)
il_counties %>% 
  slice(1:3)
class(il_counties$geometry)
st_bbox(il_counties$geometry)

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = il_counties)

cook_county <- tracts("IL", county = "cook", cb = TRUE)

#fct_lump n = 3

```





## Narrow data to a single city and plot it using sf and tigris

```{r}
chicago <- homicide %>% 
  filter(city_name == "Chicago, IL")
  
```
